summary.span: 表示主控台應用程式 (Console Application) 的標準輸入、輸出和錯誤資料流。

span.span: Represents the standard input, output, and error streams for console applications.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主控台是作業系統視窗，其中使用者互動與作業系統，或在以文字為基礎的主控台應用程式透過電腦鍵盤的文字輸入，以及讀取電腦的終端機中的文字輸出。The console is an operating system window where users interact with the operating system or with a text-based console application by entering text input through the computer keyboard, and by reading text output from the computer terminal. 比方說，在 Windows 作業系統中，主控台會呼叫 [命令提示字元] 視窗，並接受 MS-DOS 命令。For example, in the Windows operating system, the console is called the Command Prompt window and accepts MS-DOS commands. 類別會提供讀取字元，並將字元寫入至主控台應用程式中的基本支援。The class provides basic support for applications that read characters from, and write characters to, the console. 如需開發資訊類別，請參閱下列各節：For information about developing with the class, see the following sections: - [主控台 I/O 資料流Console I/O Streams](#Streams) - [螢幕緩衝區和主控台視窗Screen Buffer and Console Window](#Buffer) - [在主控台的 Unicode 支援Unicode Support for the Console](#Unicode) - [常見的作業Common Operations](#Operations) - [.NET core 的資訊.NET Core Notes](#Core) ## 主控台 I/O 資料流Console I/O Streams 作業系統的主控台應用程式啟動時，自動將使用主控台三種 I/O 資料流： 標準輸入資料流、 標準輸出資料流和標準錯誤輸出資料流。When a console application starts, the operating system automatically associates three I/O streams with the console: standard input stream, standard output stream, and standard error output stream. 您的應用程式可以讀取標準輸入資料流; 的使用者輸入一般的資料寫入標準輸出資料流中;和標準錯誤輸出資料流寫入資料時發生錯誤。Your application can read user input from the standard input stream; write normal data to the standard output stream; and write error data to the standard error output stream. 這些資料流形式顯示給您的應用程式的值作為， ，和屬性。These streams are presented to your application as the values of the , , and properties. 根據預設的值屬性是物件，表示鍵盤和值並屬性代表主控台視窗的物件。By default, the value of the property is a object that represents the keyboard, and the values of the and properties are objects that represent a console window. 不過，您可以設定這些屬性不代表主控台視窗或鍵盤; 的資料流例如，您可以設定這些屬性，代表檔案的資料流。However, you can set these properties to streams that do not represent the console window or keyboard; for example, you can set these properties to streams that represent files. 若要重新導向標準輸入、 標準輸出或標準錯誤資料流，呼叫， ，或方法，分別。To redirect the standard input, standard output, or standard error stream, call the , , or method, respectively. 使用這些資料流的 I/O 作業會同步處理，這表示多個執行緒可以讀取或寫入資料流。I/O operations that use these streams are synchronized, which means that multiple threads can read from, or write to, the streams. 這表示，方法是通常非同步作業，例如，以同步方式執行，如果物件表示的主控台中的資料流。This means that methods that are ordinarily asynchronous, such as , execute synchronously if the object represents a console stream. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用類別，以自動執行的應用程式，例如伺服器應用程式中顯示輸出。Do not use the class to display output in unattended applications, such as server applications. 呼叫方法這類和GUI 應用程式中會有任何作用。Calls to methods such as and have no effect in GUI applications. 當基礎資料流導向主控台正常運作的類別成員可能會擲回例外狀況，如果資料流重新導向，例如，檔案。 class members that work normally when the underlying stream is directed to a console might throw an exception if the stream is redirected, for example, to a file. 應用程式設定攔截例外狀況，如果您重新導向標準資料流。Program your application to catch exceptions if you redirect a standard stream. 您也可以使用， ，並屬性，以決定是否要將標準資料流導向之前執行的作業會擲回例外狀況。You can also use the , , and properties to determine whether a standard stream is redirected before performing an operation that throws an exception. 可能會很有用來明確呼叫所表示的資料流物件的成員清單， ，和屬性。It is sometimes useful to explicitly call the members of the stream objects represented by the , , and properties. 例如，根據預設，方法會從標準輸入資料流讀取輸入。For example, by default, the method reads input from the standard input stream. 同樣地，方法會將資料寫入標準輸出資料流，資料後面接著預設行終止字串，也就是歸位字元和換行字元 ("\r\n")。Similarly, the method writes data to the standard output stream, and the data is followed by the default line termination string, which is a carriage return and line feed ("\r\n"). 不過，類別不提供對應的方法，將資料寫入標準錯誤輸出資料流或要變更寫入至該資料流的資料行終止字串的屬性。However, the class does not provide a corresponding method to write data to the standard error output stream, or a property to change the line termination string for data written to that stream. 您可以藉由設定來解決這個問題的屬性或到另一個行終止字串的屬性。You can solve this problem by setting the property of the or property to another line termination string. 例如，下列 C# 陳述式會將標準錯誤輸出資料流的終止串線設定為兩個歸位字元和換行字元序列：For example, the following C# statement sets the line termination string for the standard error output stream to two carriage return and line feed sequences: `Console.Error.NewLine = "\r\n\r\n";` 然後，您可以明確呼叫錯誤的輸出資料流物件，如下列 C# 陳述式所示的方法：You can then explicitly call the method of the error output stream object, as in the following C# statement: `Console.Error.WriteLine();` ## 螢幕緩衝區和主控台視窗Screen Buffer and Console Window 在主控台的兩個密切相關的功能是螢幕緩衝區而主控台視窗。Two closely related features of the console are the screen buffer and the console window. 實際讀取或寫入主控台中，所擁有的資料流的文字，但出現讀取或寫入至主控台呼叫螢幕緩衝區所擁有的區域。Text is actually read from or written to streams owned by the console, but appear to be read from or written to an area owned by the console called the screen buffer. 螢幕緩衝區的主控台中，屬性，並會組織成資料列和每個方格交集或字元儲存格，可以包含字元的資料行的矩形格線。The screen buffer is an attribute of the console, and is organized as a rectangular grid of rows and columns where each grid intersection, or character cell, can contain a character. 每個字元有它自己的前景色彩，而且每個字元儲存格有自己的背景色彩。Each character has its own foreground color, and each character cell has its own background color. 螢幕緩衝區是透過稱為主控台視窗的矩形區域檢視。The screen buffer is viewed through a rectangular region called the console window. 主控台視窗將會在主控台中; 的另一個屬性它不是主控台本身，也就是作業系統視窗。The console window is another attribute of the console; it is not the console itself, which is an operating system window. 主控台視窗排列在資料列和資料行小於或等於螢幕緩衝區的大小，是可以移至檢視的基礎螢幕緩衝區的不同區域。The console window is arranged in rows and columns, is less than or equal to the size of the screen buffer, and can be moved to view different areas of the underlying screen buffer. 如果螢幕緩衝區大於主控台視窗中，主控台將會自動顯示捲軸讓主控台視窗可以重新定位到螢幕緩衝區的區域。If the screen buffer is larger than the console window, the console automatically displays scroll bars so the console window can be repositioned over the screen buffer area. 資料指標會指出其中目前讀取或寫入文字的螢幕緩衝區位置。A cursor indicates the screen buffer position where text is currently read or written. 資料指標可以隱藏或顯示，並可變更其高度。The cursor can be hidden or made visible, and its height can be changed. 如果資料指標為可見，主控台視窗的位置是在因此資料指標永遠都是在檢視中自動移動。If the cursor is visible, the console window position is moved automatically so the cursor is always in view. 螢幕緩衝區中的字元資料格座標的來源是左上的角，且資料指標，而主控台視窗的位置會以相對於該原點。The origin for character cell coordinates in the screen buffer is the upper left corner, and the positions of the cursor and the console window are measured relative to that origin. 使用以零為起始的索引來指定位置;也就是指定為資料列 0，並做為資料行 0 最左邊的資料行的最上方的資料列。Use zero-based indexes to specify positions; that is, specify the topmost row as row 0, and the leftmost column as column 0. 資料列和資料行索引的最大值是。The maximum value for the row and column indexes is . ## 在主控台的 Unicode 支援Unicode Support for the Console 一般情況下，主控台讀取輸入，並將輸出寫入使用目前的主控台字碼頁，將系統地區設定定義預設。In general, the console reads input and writes output by using the current console code page, which the system locale defines by default. 字碼頁可以處理可用的 Unicode 字元的子集，因此如果您嘗試顯示的字元沒有對應的特定字碼頁，主控台將無法顯示所有字元，或精確地表示它們。A code page can handle only a subset of available Unicode characters, so if you try to display characters that are not mapped by a particular code page, the console won't be able to display all characters or represent them accurately. 下列範例說明此問題。The following example illustrates this problem. 它會嘗試對主控台顯示 044F u+0000 到 U + 0410年從斯拉夫字元。It tries to display the characters of the Cyrillic alphabet from U+0410 to U+044F to the console. 如果您使用主控台字碼頁 437 上的系統上執行範例，每個字元是由問號 （？），取代，因為斯拉夫語字元不會對應至字碼頁 437 則中的字元。If you run the example on a system that uses console code page 437, each character is replaced by a question mark (?), because Cyrillic characters do not map to the characters in code page 437. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/unicode1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/unicode1.vb#1)] 除了支援字碼頁類別支援 utf-8 編碼方式和類別。In addition to supporting code pages, the class supports UTF-8 encoding with the class. 從.NET Framework 4.5類別也支援 utf-16 編碼方式和類別。Beginning with the .NET Framework 4.5, the class also supports UTF-16 encoding with the class. 若要在主控台中顯示的 Unicode 字元。To display Unicode characters to the console. 您設定屬性設為或。you set the property to either or . 支援 Unicode 字元需要編碼器將特定的 Unicode 字元，辨識，而且也需要有圖像 （glyph），來呈現該字元所需的字型。Support for Unicode characters requires the encoder to recognize a particular Unicode character, and also requires a font that has the glyphs needed to render that character. 若要成功地對主控台顯示 Unicode 字元，必須設定主控台字型非點陣或 TrueType 字型，例如 Consolas 或 Lucida Console。To successfully display Unicode characters to the console, the console font must be set to a non-raster or TrueType font such as Consolas or Lucida Console. 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計方式變更字型從點陣字型 Lucida console。The following example shows how you can programmatically change the font from a raster font to Lucida Console. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/cs/setfont1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/vb/setfont1.vb#3)] 不過，TrueType 字型可以顯示圖像 （glyph） 的子集。However, TrueType fonts can display only a subset of glyphs. 比方說，新細明體字型顯示只有 643 從 u+0021 到 U + FB02 大約 64,000 可用字元。For example, the Lucida Console font displays only 643 of the approximately 64,000 available characters from U+0021 to U+FB02. 若要查看其字元特定字型支援，請開啟**字型**在 控制台 小程式選擇**尋找符號**選項，然後選擇 的字型的字元集您想要檢查**字型**份**字元對應表**視窗。To see which characters a particular font supports, open the **Fonts** applet in Control Panel, choose the **Find a character** option, and choose the font whose character set you'd like to examine in the **Font** list of the **Character Map** window. Windows 使用字型連結來顯示不在特定字型中字符。Windows uses font linking to display glyphs that are not available in a particular font. 如需連結以顯示其他字元集的字型資訊，請參閱[全球化逐步： 字型](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229111)。For information about font linking to display additional character sets, see [Globalization Step-by-Step: Fonts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229111). 連結的字型定義於登錄 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontLink\SystemLink 子機碼。Linked fonts are defined in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontLink\SystemLink subkey of the registry. 這個子機碼相關聯的每個項目對應的基底字型名稱，其值為字串陣列，定義字型檔案和已連結至基底字型的字型。Each entry associated with this subkey corresponds to the name of a base font, and its value is a string array that defines the font files and the fonts that are linked to the base font. 陣列的每個成員定義連結的字型，並採用下列格式*字型檔名*，*字型名稱*。Each member of the array defines a linked font and takes the form *font-file-name*,*font-name*. 下列範例說明如何以程式設計方式定義名為 Pmingliu 位於名為 simsun.ttc 顯示簡化 Han 字元的字型檔的連結的字型。The following example illustrates how you can programmatically define a linked font named SimSun found in a font file named simsun.ttc that displays Simplified Han characters. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/fontlink1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/fontlink1.vb#2)] 在主控台的 Unicode 支援具有下列限制：Unicode support for the console has the following limitations: - 不支援 UTF-32 編碼。UTF-32 encoding is not supported. 唯一支援的 Unicode 編碼為 utf-8 及 utf-16，這由和類別，分別。The only supported Unicode encodings are UTF-8 and UTF-16, which are represented by the and classes, respectively. - 不支援雙向輸出。Bidirectional output is not supported. - 顯示基本多語文字面之外的字元 (亦即，surrogate 字組) 不支援，即使它們定義在連結的字型檔案。Display of characters outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (that is, of surrogate pairs) is not supported, even if they are defined in a linked font file. - 不支援顯示複雜的指令碼中的字元。Display of characters in complex scripts is not supported. - 結合字元序列 （也就是個字元所組成的基底的字元和一個或多個組合的字元） 會顯示為不同的字元。Combining character sequences (that is, characters that consist of a base character and one or more combining characters) are displayed as separate characters. 若要解決這項限制，您可以將正規化的字串會顯示藉由呼叫方法，然後再將輸出傳送至主控台。To work around this limitation, you can normalize the string to be displayed by calling the method before sending output to the console. 在下列範例中，包含組合字元的字串排序 U + 0061 為輸出字串會正規化之前, 的兩個字元，並為單一字元之後，將會顯示到主控台的 U + 0308年呼叫方法。In the following example, a string that contains the combining character sequence U+0061 U+0308 is displayed to the console as two characters before the output string is normalized, and as a single character after the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/normalize1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/normalize1.vb#5)] 請注意當正規化標準字元包括對應至特定 combining 預先撰寫的表單的 Unicode 字元序列時，才會是可行的解決方案。Note that normalization is a viable solution only if the Unicode standard for the character includes a pre-composed form that corresponds to a particular combining character sequence. - 如果字型提供私用區域字碼指標的圖像 （glyph），將會顯示該圖像 （glyph）。If a font provides a glyph for a code point in the private use area, that glyph will be displayed. 不過，因為私用區域中的字元都是特定應用程式，這可能不是預期的圖像 （glyph）。However, because characters in the private use area are application-specific, this may not be the expected glyph. 下列範例會顯示到主控台的 Unicode 字元的範圍。The following example displays a range of Unicode characters to the console. 此範例接受三個命令列參數： 要顯示，以顯示，以及是否要使用目前的主控台編碼範圍的結尾範圍的開頭 (`false`) 或 utf-16 編碼 (`true`)。The example accepts three command-line parameters: the start of the range to display, the end of the range to display, and whether to use the current console encoding (`false`) or UTF-16 encoding (`true`). 它會假設主控台使用 TrueType 字型。It assumes that the console is using a TrueType font. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/example3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/example3.vb#4)] ## 常見的作業Common Operations 類別包含下列方法來讀取主控台輸入和寫入主控台輸出：The class contains the following methods for reading console input and writing console output: - 多載方法讀取個別字元。The overloads of the method read an individual character. - 方法讀取一整行的輸入。The method reads an entire line of input. - 方法多載的實值類型、 陣列的字元或一組物件執行個體轉換為格式化或未格式化的字串，並再將該字串寫入主控台。The method overloads convert an instance of a value type, an array of characters, or a set of objects to a formatted or unformatted string, and then write that string to the console. - 一組平行方法多載相同字串做為輸出多載，但也加入行終止字串。A parallel set of method overloads output the same string as the overloads but also add a line termination string. 類別也包含方法和屬性來執行下列作業：The class also contains methods and properties to perform the following operations: - 取得或設定螢幕緩衝區的大小。Get or set the size of the screen buffer. 並屬性可讓您取得或設定緩衝區的高度和寬度分別和方法可讓您在單一方法呼叫中設定緩衝區大小。The and properties let you get or set the buffer height and width, respectively, and the method lets you set the buffer size in a single method call. - 取得或設定主控台視窗的大小。Get or set the size of the console window. 並屬性可讓您取得或設定視窗的高度和寬度分別和方法可讓您設定在單一方法呼叫中的視窗大小。The and properties let you get or set the window height and width, respectively, and the method lets you set the window size in a single method call. - 取得或設定資料指標的大小。Get or set the size of the cursor. 屬性指定以字元儲存格的游標的高度。The property specifies the height of the cursor in a character cell. - 取得或設定相對於螢幕緩衝區的主控台視窗的位置。Get or set the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer. 並屬性可讓您取得或設定上方資料列和會出現在主控台視窗中，螢幕緩衝區的最左邊資料行和方法可讓您在單一方法呼叫中設定這些值。The and properties let you get or set the top row and leftmost column of the screen buffer that appears in the console window, and the method lets you set these values in a single method call. - 取得或設定游標的位置，取得或設定由並屬性或設定游標的位置呼叫方法。Get or set the position of the cursor by getting or setting the and properties, or set the position of the cursor by calling the method. - 移動或清除螢幕緩衝區中的資料，藉由呼叫或方法。Move or clear data in the screen buffer by calling the or method. - 取得或設定使用的前景和背景色彩並屬性，或藉由呼叫中重 background 和 foreground 設為其預設色彩方法。Get or set the foreground and background colors by using the and properties, or reset the background and foreground to their default colors by calling the method. - 藉由呼叫播放嗶聲透過主控台喇叭的聲音方法。Play the sound of a beep through the console speaker by calling the method. ## [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] 附註Notes 在桌面上，.NET Framework 中類別會使用所傳回的編碼`GetConsoleCP`和`GetConsoleOutputCP`，這通常字碼頁編碼方式。In the .NET Framework on the desktop, the class uses the encoding returned by `GetConsoleCP` and `GetConsoleOutputCP`, which typically is a code page encoding. 比方說在系統文化特性是英文 （美國），字碼頁 437 上的程式碼，是依預設會使用的編碼方式。For example code, on systems whose culture is English (United States), code page 437 is the encoding that is used by default. 不過，[!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)]可以提供可用的只有這些編碼方式的有限的子集。However, [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] may make only a limited subset of these encodings available. 在這種情況，做為主控台的預設編碼方式。Where this is the case, is used as the default encoding for the console. 如果您的應用程式相依於特定字碼頁編碼方式，您仍然可以在它們可執行下列*之前*呼叫任何方法：If your app depends on specific code page encodings, you can still make them available by doing the following *before* you call any methods: 1. 您可以將 System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 組件的參考加入專案。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. 2. 擷取物件從屬性。Retrieve the object from the property. 3. 傳遞物件至進行編碼的提供者所支援的其他編碼的方法。Pass the object to the method to make the additional encodings supported by the encoding provider available. 類別會再自動使用預設系統編碼方式 」，而不 UTF8，前提是您註冊編碼提供者之前呼叫任何輸出方法。The class will then automatically use the default system encoding rather than UTF8, provided that you have registered the encoding provider before calling any output methods. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何讀取資料，並將資料寫入至標準輸入和輸出資料流。The following example demonstrates how to read data from, and write data to, the standard input and output streams. 請注意這些資料流，可以使用重新導向和方法。Note that these streams can be redirected by using the and methods. Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. summary.span: 透過主控台喇叭播放嗶聲。

span.span: Plays the sound of a beep through the console speaker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，播放嗶聲 800 赫茲的頻率持續時間為 200 毫秒。By default, the beep plays at a frequency of 800 hertz for a duration of 200 milliseconds. > [!NOTE] > 方法不支援在 64 位元版本的 Windows Vista 和 Windows XP 上。The method is not supported on the 64-bit editions of Windows Vista and Windows XP. 包裝呼叫 Windows[函式發出嗶聲](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms679277.aspx)。 wraps a call to the Windows [Beep function](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms679277.aspx). 是否8254 可程式化間隔計時器晶片與否取決於 Windows 7 之前，會產生在舊版 Windows 上的音效。Whether produces a sound on versions of Windows before Windows 7 depends on the presence of a 8254 programmable interval timer chip. 從 Windows 7 開始，視預設音訊裝置。Starting with Windows 7, it depends on the default sound device. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 此範例接受從 1 到 9，做為命令列引數的數字，並播放嗶聲該數字的次數。The example accepts a number from 1 through 9 as a command line argument, and plays the beep that number of times. summary.span: 取得或設定緩衝區的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the buffer area.

value.span: 以資料列數測量的目前緩衝區高度。

span.span: The current height, in rows, of the buffer area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會定義資料列 （或線條） 儲存在可存取的主控台模式視窗的緩衝區的數目。This property defines the number of rows (or lines) stored in the buffer that is accessed by a console mode window. 相反地，屬性會定義在任何特定時間實際顯示在主控台視窗中的資料列數目。In contrast, the property defines the number of rows that are actually displayed in the console window at any particular time. 如果實際寫入至緩衝區的資料列數目超過所定義的資料列數目屬性，使其顯示連續的數字相等的資料列的視窗也可垂直捲動屬性且位於任何位置中的緩衝區。If the number of rows actually written to the buffer exceeds the number of rows defined by the property, the window can be scrolled vertically so that it displays a contiguous number of rows that are equal to the property and are located anywhere in the buffer. 如果設定作業減少的值屬性，會移除最上方的行。If a set operation decreases the value of the property, the uppermost lines are removed. 例如，如果從 300 減少的行數，是將它設為 250，行 0 至 49 會遭到移除，而且現有的程式行 50 到 299 成為程式行 0 到 249。For example, if the number of lines is reduced from 300 to 250, lines 0 through 49 are removed, and the existing lines 50 through 299 become lines 0 through 249. ## Examples 此範例示範和屬性。This example demonstrates the and properties. 此範例會報告作業系統視窗設定為 300 的資料列和 85 的資料行的緩衝區大小的維度。The example reports the dimensions of an operating system window set to a buffer size of 300 rows and 85 columns. summary.span: 發生於同時按下 輔助按鍵 (Ctrl) 和 主控台按鍵 (C) 或 Break 鍵 (Ctrl+C 或 Ctrl+Break) 時。

span.span: Occurs when the modifier key (Ctrl) and either the console key (C) or the Break key are pressed simultaneously (Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件用於搭配和。This event is used in conjunction with and . 事件可讓以攔截 Ctrl + C 訊號，因此事件處理常式可以決定是否要繼續執行，或終止的主控台應用程式。The event enables a console application to intercept the Ctrl+C signal so the event handler can decide whether to continue executing or terminate. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 當使用者按下 Ctrl + C 或 Ctrl + Break、引發事件時，應用程式的事件處理常式會執行。When the user presses either Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break, the event is fired and the application's event handler is executed. 傳遞的事件處理常式有兩個有用的屬性的物件：The event handler is passed a object that has two useful properties: - 可讓您決定是否因為使用者按下 Ctrl + C 而叫用處理常式 (屬性值，則) 或 Ctrl + Break (的屬性值是)。, which allows you to determine whether the handler was invoked as a result of the user pressing Ctrl+C (the property value is ) or Ctrl+Break (the property value is ). - 可讓您判斷如何您的應用程式應該回應使用者按下 Ctrl + C 或 Ctrl + Break。, which allows you to determine how to your application should respond to the user pressing Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break. 根據預設，屬性是`false`，這會導致程式終止的事件處理常式結束時執行。By default, the property is `false`, which causes program execution to terminate when the event handler exits. 變更它的屬性為`true`指定應用程式應該繼續執行。Changing its property to `true` specifies that the application should continue to execute. > [!TIP] > 如果您的應用程式有簡單的需求，您可以使用屬性，而不是此事件。If your application has simple requirements, you can use the property instead of this event. 此屬性設定為`false`，您可以確保您的應用程式一律會結束，如果使用者按下 Ctrl + C。By setting this property to `false`, you can ensure that your application always exits if the user presses Ctrl+C. 藉由將它設定為`true`，您可以確保按下 Ctrl + C 將不會終止應用程式。By setting it to `true`, you can ensure that pressing Ctrl+C will not terminate the application. 此事件的事件處理常式會在執行緒集區執行緒上執行。The event handler for this event is executed on a thread pool thread. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何」 事件可用。The following example demonstrates how the event is used. 當您按 Ctrl + C 時，中斷讀取的作業和`myHandler`叫用事件處理常式。When you press Ctrl+C, the read operation is interrupted and the `myHandler` event handler is invoked. 在事件處理常式中，輸入時屬性是`false`，也就是說，事件處理常式結束時，目前的處理序將會終止。Upon entry to the event handler, the property is `false`, which means that the current process will terminate when the event handler terminates. 不過，事件處理常式會將屬性設`true`，也就是說，將不會終止處理程序，且讀取的作業將會恢復。However, the event handler sets the property to `true`, which means that the process will not terminate and the read operation will resume. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

summary.span: 清除主控台緩衝區及包含顯示資訊的對應主控台視窗。

span.span: Clears the console buffer and corresponding console window of display information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法就相當叫用 MS-DOS`cls`命令在命令提示字元 視窗中。Using the method is equivalent invoking the MS-DOS `cls` command in the command prompt window. 當呼叫方法時，游標會自動捲動至視窗的左上角和螢幕緩衝區的內容會設定為使用目前的前景背景色彩的空白。When the method is called, the cursor automatically scrolls to the top-left corner of the window and the contents of the screen buffer are set to blanks using the current foreground background colors. > [!NOTE] > 嘗試呼叫主控台應用程式的輸出重新導向至檔案時的方法會擲回。Attempting to call the method when a console application's output is redirected to a file throws a . 若要避免這個問題，一律將呼叫方法中的`try`...`catch`To prevent this, always wrap a call to the method in a `try`…`catch` 區塊。block. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以清除主控台，再執行迴圈，會提示使用者選取前景和背景色彩，並輸入要顯示的字串。The following example uses the method to clear the console before it executes a loop, prompts the user to select a foreground and background color and to enter a string to display. 如果使用者選擇不結束程式，就會還原主控台的原始前景和背景色彩和再次執行迴圈前再一次呼叫方法。If the user chooses not to exit the program, the console's original foreground and background colors are restored and the method is called again before re-executing the loop. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.clear/cs/clear1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.clear/vb/clear1.vb#1)] 此範例依賴`GetKeyPress`方法以驗證使用者的選取範圍的前景和背景色彩。The example relies on a `GetKeyPress` method to validate the user's selection of a foreground and background color. 此範例示範並屬性，而和方法。This example demonstrates the and properties, and the and methods. 範例會將定位資料指標，用來決定下, 一次寫入，就會發生 5 個字元的矩形混用繪製的 5 個字元"+"、"|"，和 「-」 字串。The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings. 請注意，無法使用較少的步驟使用的其他字串組合繪製矩形。Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings. [!code-cpp[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/CPP/lts.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/CS/lts.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/VB/lts.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得標準錯誤輸出資料流。

span.span: Gets the standard error output stream.

value.span: ，代表標準錯誤輸出資料流。

span.span: A that represents the standard error output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，此標準錯誤資料流是設主控台。This standard error stream is set to the console by default. 它可以設定為與另一個資料流方法。It can be set to another stream with the method. 重新導向標準錯誤資料流之後，它可以重新呼叫方法。After the standard error stream is redirected, it can be reacquired by calling the method. 在其資訊的輸出通常會導向至檔案的主控台應用程式，標準錯誤資料流可透過屬性可用來對主控台顯示的資訊，即使在重新導向輸出。In console applications whose informational output is often redirected to a file, the standard error stream available through the property can be used to display information to the console even if output is redirected. 下列範例會顯示 10 個數字的產品資料表，在從 1 開始的時間。The following example displays product tables for 10 numbers at a time starting with 1. 10 的數字，每個集合之後屬性用來詢問使用者是否顯示中的下一步。After every set of 10 numbers, the property is used to ask the user whether to display the next set. 如果標準輸出重新導向至檔案，使用者仍會要求常式是否應該產生產品下一組。If the standard output is redirected to a file, the user is still asked whether the routine should generate the next set of products. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Error#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.error/cs/error1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Error#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.error/vb/error1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列範例是命令列公用程式，名為四個空格，所定義的值會取代文字檔案中的索引標籤字元的 ExpandTabs`tabSize`變數。The following example is a command line utility named ExpandTabs that replaces tab characters in a text file with four spaces, the value defined by the `tabSize` variable. 它會重新導向標準輸出和輸出資料流處理至檔案，但使用寫入主控台中的標準錯誤資料流的屬性。It redirects the standard input and output streams to files, but uses the property to write the standard error stream to the console. 它可以啟動從命令列藉由提供包含定位字元的檔案名稱和輸出檔的名稱。It can be launched from the command line by supplying the name of the file that contains tab characters and the name of the output file. [!code-cpp[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/CPP/expandtabsex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/CS/expandtabsex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/VB/expandtabsex.vb#1)] 下列範例是簡單的文字檔案檢視器，在主控台中顯示一或多個文字檔案的內容。The following example is a simple text file viewer that displays the contents of one or more text files to the console. 如果不有任何命令列引數，或如果命令列引數傳遞的任何檔案不存在，此範例會呼叫方法，以錯誤的資訊重新導向至檔案，呼叫過程中重新取得標準錯誤的方法串流處理，並指出錯誤資訊已寫入至檔案。If there are no command line arguments, or if any files passed as command line arguments do not exist, the example calls the method to redirect error information to a file, calls the method in the process of reacquiring the standard error stream, and indicates that error information was written to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/cs/viewtextfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/vb/viewtextfile.vb#1)] 請注意，屬性設定為`true`之前重新取得資料流時發生錯誤。Note that the property is set to `true` before reacquiring the error stream. 這可確保，輸出將會立即傳送至主控台而不是經過緩衝處理。This ensures that output will be sent to the console immediately rather than buffered.

summary.span: 取得或設定主控台的前景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the foreground color of the console.

value.span: ，可指定主控台的前景色彩，也就是出現的每一個字元的色彩。

span.span: A that specifies the foreground color of the console; that is, the color of each character that is displayed.

value.span: 預設為灰色。

span.span: The default is gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 取得 」 作業是以 Windows 為基礎應用程式，在其中一個主控台不存在，傳回。A get operation for a Windows-based application, in which a console does not exist, returns . ## Examples 下列範例會檢查是否主控台的背景色彩是黑色，如果是，它會變更的背景色彩為紅色，設為黑色的前景色彩。The following example checks whether the console's background color is black and, if it is, it changes the background color to red and the foreground color to black. [!code-csharp[System.ConsoleColor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/cs/Example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ConsoleColor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/vb/Example2.vb#2)] 下列範例會將儲存的值列舉型別陣列，並將目前的值和變數的屬性。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然後變更的前景色彩中的每個色彩列舉型別，但色彩符合目前的背景，而且它變成背景色彩中每個色彩以外的列舉型別，來比對的色彩目前的前景。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果前景色彩與背景色彩相同，文字看不到。）最後，它會呼叫方法來還原原始的主控台色彩。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. [!code-csharp[System.ConsoleColor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/cs/foregroundcolor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ConsoleColor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/vb/foregroundcolor3.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性是設標準輸入資料流。This property is set to the standard input stream by default. 這個屬性可以設定為與另一個資料流方法。This property can be set to another stream with the method. 標準輸入資料流的讀取作業以同步方式執行。Read operations on the standard input stream execute synchronously. 亦即，它們會封鎖直到指定的讀取的作業完成為止。That is, they block until the specified read operation has completed. 這就是偶數，則為 true 如果非同步方法，例如上, 呼叫所傳回的物件屬性。This is true even if an asynchronous method, such as , is called on the object returned by the property. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用`In`屬性。The following sample illustrates the use of the `In` property. summary.span: 取得或設定主控台用來讀取輸入的編碼方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding the console uses to read input.

value.span: 用來讀取主控台輸入的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding used to read console input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主控台會使用輸入來轉譯成對應的字元的鍵盤輸入的編碼方式。The console uses the input encoding to translate keyboard input into a corresponding character. 輸入的編碼方式會併入 256 鍵盤字元碼對應和個別字元的字碼頁。The input encoding incorporates a code page that maps 256 keyboard character codes to individual characters. 不同的字碼頁包含不同的特殊字元，一般而言是針對語言或語言群組進行自訂。Different code pages include different special characters, typically customized for a language or a group of languages. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，屬性取得作業可能會傳回快取的值，而非主控台的目前輸入的編碼方式。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current input encoding. 這種情形的值指派給以外的其他方式修改屬性屬性，例如呼叫 Windows`SetConsoleCP`函式，或使用`chcp`命令從 PowerShell 指令碼。This can occur if the value of the property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleCP` function or using the `chcp` command from a PowerShell script.

summary.span: 將螢幕緩衝區的指定之來源區域複製到指定之目標區域中。

span.span: Copies a specified source area of the screen buffer to a specified destination area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目的地和來源參數會指定位於目前的螢幕緩衝區的界限之外的位置，則會複製只可容納在目的地區域內的來源區域的一部分。If the destination and source parameters specify a position located outside the boundaries of the current screen buffer, only the portion of the source area that fits within the destination area is copied. 也就是來源區域會裁剪成目前的螢幕緩衝區。That is, the source area is clipped to fit the current screen buffer. 方法會將來源區域複製到目的區域。The method copies the source area to the destination area. 如果目的區域沒有交集來源區域，使用目前的前景和背景色彩的空白填滿來源區域。If the destination area does not intersect the source area, the source area is filled with blanks using the current foreground and background colors. 否則不填滿來源區域的交集的部分。Otherwise, the intersected portion of the source area is not filled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目的地和來源參數會指定目前的螢幕緩衝區的界限之外的位置，則會複製只可容納在目的地區域內的來源區域的一部分。If the destination and source parameters specify a position located beyond the boundaries of the current screen buffer, only the portion of the source area that fits within the destination area is copied. 也就是來源區域會裁剪成目前的螢幕緩衝區。That is, the source area is clipped to fit the current screen buffer. 方法會將來源區域複製到目的區域。The method copies the source area to the destination area. 目的區域沒有交集來源區域，如果來源區域會填入所指定的字元`sourceChar`，使用所指定的色彩`sourceForeColor`和`sourceBackColor`。If the destination area does not intersect the source area, the source area is filled with the character specified by `sourceChar`, using the colors specified by `sourceForeColor` and `sourceBackColor`. 否則不填滿來源區域的交集的部分。Otherwise, the intersected portion of the source area is not filled. 方法會執行任何作業，如果`sourceWidth`或`sourceHeight`為零。The method performs no operation if `sourceWidth` or `sourceHeight` is zero.

summary.span: 擷取標準錯誤資料流。

span.span: Acquires the standard error stream.
The standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來重新取得標準錯誤資料流，藉由變更之後方法。This method can be used to reacquire the standard error stream after it has been changed by the method. ## Examples 下列範例是簡單的文字檔案檢視器，在主控台中顯示一或多個文字檔案的內容。The following example is a simple text file viewer that displays the contents of one or more text files to the console. 如果不有任何命令列引數，或如果命令列引數傳遞的任何檔案不存在，此範例會呼叫方法，以錯誤的資訊重新導向至檔案，呼叫過程中重新取得標準錯誤的方法串流處理，並指出錯誤資訊已寫入至檔案。If there are no command line arguments, or if any files passed as command line arguments do not exist, the example calls the method to redirect error information to a file, calls the method in the process of reacquiring the standard error stream, and indicates that error information was written to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/cs/viewtextfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/vb/viewtextfile.vb#1)] 請注意，屬性設定為`true`之前重新取得資料流時發生錯誤。Note that the property is set to `true` before reacquiring the error stream. 這可確保，輸出將會立即傳送至主控台而不是經過緩衝處理。This ensures that output will be sent to the console immediately rather than buffered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，此屬性是設定標準輸出資料流。This property is set to the standard output stream by default. 這個屬性可以設定為與另一個資料流方法。This property can be set to another stream with the method. 請注意，呼叫`Console.Out.WriteLine`方法相當於呼叫對應方法。Note that calls to `Console.Out.WriteLine` methods are equivalent to calls to the corresponding methods. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來顯示包含的標準輸出裝置的應用程式的目前目錄中的檔案名稱的陣列。The following example uses the property to display an array containing the names of files in the application's current directory to the standard output device. 接著為 Files.txt 檔案中設定的標準輸出，並列出檔案的陣列項目。It then sets the standard output to a file named Files.txt and lists the array elements to the file. 最後，它會設定輸出至標準輸出資料流，並再次顯示到標準輸出裝置的陣列項目。Finally, it sets the output to the standard output stream and again displays the array elements to the standard output device. summary.span: 取得或設定主控台用來寫入輸出的編碼方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding the console uses to write output.

value.span: 用來寫入主控台輸出的編碼方式。

span.span: The encoding used to write console output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主控台會使用輸出的編碼方式轉譯成對應的主控台顯示字元的應用程式所寫入的字元。The console uses the output encoding to translate characters written by an application into corresponding console display characters. 主控台會使用的預設字碼頁是由系統地區設定決定。The default code page that the console uses is determined by the system locale. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，屬性取得作業可能會傳回快取的值，而非主控台的目前輸出的編碼方式。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current output encoding. 這種情形的值指派給以外的其他方式修改屬性屬性，例如呼叫 Windows`SetConsoleOutputCP`函式。This can occur if the value of the property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleOutputCP` function.

exception.span: 設定作業中的屬性值為 。

span.span: The property value in a set operation is .

exception.span: 執行這項作業期間發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred during the execution of this operation.

exception.span: 您的應用程式沒有執行這項作業的權限。

span.span: Your application does not have permission to perform this operation.

permission.span: 用於讀取和寫入最上層視窗和子視窗。

span.span: for reading and writing to top-level windows and subwindows.
Associated enumeration:

para.span: Unicode 編碼之外類別支援 utf-8 編碼類別，從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，它支援 utf-16 編碼方式和類別。

span.span: Of the Unicode encodings, the class supports UTF-8 encoding with the class and, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it supports UTF-16 encoding with the class.

para.span: UTF-32 編碼方式和類別不支援。

span.span: UTF-32 encoding with the class is not supported.

para.span: 嘗試設定輸出編碼方式以 UTF-32 則會擲回。

span.span: Attempting to set the output encoding to UTF-32 throws an .

para.span: 請注意，已成功在主控台中顯示的 Unicode 字元需要下列項目：

span.span: Note that successfully displaying Unicode characters to the console requires the following:

para.span: -主控台必須使用 TrueType 字型，例如 Lucida Console 或 Consolas，若要顯示的字元。

span.span: - The console must use a TrueType font, such as Lucida Console or Consolas, to display characters.

para.span: -A 主控台所使用的字型必須定義特定的圖像或字符才能顯示。

span.span: - A font used by the console must define the particular glyph or glyphs to be displayed.

para.span: 在主控台可以利用字型連結以顯示來自連結字型的字符，如果基底字型大小不包含該圖像 （glyph） 的定義。

span.span: The console can take advantage of font linking to display glyphs from linked fonts if the base font does not contain a definition for that glyph.

para.span: 如需有關支援 Unicode 編碼的主控台中，請參閱中的 < Unicode 支援的主控台 > 一節類別。

span.span: For more information about support for Unicode encoding by the console, see the "Unicode Support for the Console" section in the class.

summary.span: 從標準輸入資料流讀取下一個字元。

span.span: Reads the next character from the standard input stream.

returns.span: 輸入資料流的下一個字元，或為 -1 (如果目前不再有字元可以讀取)。

span.span: The next character from the input stream, or negative one (-1) if there are currently no more characters to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會封鎖其傳回值，當您輸入的輸入的字元時; 當您按下終止索引鍵。The method blocks its return while you type input characters; it terminates when you press the key. 按下 Enter 鍵將平台而行終止序列附加至您的輸入 （比方說，Windows 會換行字元復位換行的順序）。Pressing Enter appends a platform-dependent line termination sequence to your input (for example, Windows appends a carriage return-linefeed sequence). 後續呼叫方法一次擷取您輸入的一個字元。Subsequent calls to the method retrieve your input one character at a time. 擷取最後一個字元之後，封鎖其傳回值一次並重複週期。After the final character is retrieved, blocks its return again and the cycle repeats. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法，或有屬性並方法會偏好使用方法。The method, or the property and method are preferable to using the method. 請注意，此方法不會傳回-1 除非您執行下列動作之一：Note that the method does not return -1 unless you perform one of the following actions: - 同時按下輔助按鍵和主控台按鍵 (Ctrl + Z)，以指示的檔案結尾條件。Simultaneously press the modifier key and console key (Ctrl+Z), which signals the end-of-file condition. - 按下通知檔案結尾條件，例如 F6 函式金鑰，在 Windows 中對等索引鍵。Press an equivalent key that signals the end-of-file condition, such as the F6 function key in Windows. - 將輸入資料流重新導向到來源，例如文字檔案，具有實際的檔案結尾字元。Redirect the input stream to a source, such as a text file, that has an actual end-of-file character. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. summary.span: 取得使用者按下的下一個字元或功能鍵。

span.span: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.

summary.span: 按下的按鍵會顯示在主控台視窗中。

span.span: The pressed key is displayed in the console window.

returns.span: 物件，可描述對應到所按主控台按鍵的 常數和 Unicode 字元 (如有此項)。

span.span: An object that describes the constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key.

returns.span: 物件也描述在 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合中，是否有一或多個 Shift、Alt 或 Ctrl 輔助按鍵與主控台按鍵同時按下。

span.span: The object also describes, in a bitwise combination of values, whether one or more Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會等候，也就是在執行緒發出的區塊方法，直到按下字元或功能鍵。The method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the method, until a character or function key is pressed. 字元或函式可以是按下按鍵組合與一或多個 Alt、 Ctrl 或 Shift 輔助按鍵。A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys. 不過，按一個輔助按鍵本身並不會造成方法來傳回。However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the method to return. 根據您的應用程式中，您可能想要方法搭配屬性。Depending on your application, you might want to use the method in conjunction with the property. 方法會從鍵盤讀取，即使標準輸入會被重新導向到的檔案方法。The method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the method. ## Examples 其中一個最常見的用法方法是停止程式執行，直到使用者按下按鍵，並在應用程式會終止或顯示其他視窗的資訊。One of the most common uses of the method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information. 下列範例會使用方法以等候使用者按下 Enter 鍵之前終止應用程式。The following example uses the method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/cs/ReadKey1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/vb/ReadKey1.vb#1)] 請注意，這個多載方法預設會回應使用者按下主控台的任何可顯示金鑰。Note that this overload of the method by default echoes any displayable keys that the user presses to the console. 若要隱藏它們，請呼叫方法`intercept`引數`true`。To suppress them, call the method with an `intercept` argument of `true`. 下列範例會使用方法以顯示哪一個索引鍵的相關使用者按下的資訊...The following example uses the method to display information about which key the user pressed.. [!code-cpp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CPP/rk.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CS/rk.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/VB/rk.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會等候，也就是在執行緒發出的區塊方法，直到按下字元或功能鍵。The method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the method, until a character or function key is pressed. 字元或函式可以是按下按鍵組合與一或多個 Alt、 Ctrl 或 Shift 輔助按鍵。A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys. 不過，按一個輔助按鍵本身並不會造成方法來傳回。However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the method to return. 如果`intercept`參數是`true`，按下的按鍵攔截，而不顯示在主控台視窗中，否則會顯示按下的按鍵。If the `intercept` parameter is `true`, the pressed key is intercepted and not displayed in the console window; otherwise, the pressed key is displayed. 根據您的應用程式中，您可能想要方法搭配屬性。Depending on your application, you might want to use the method in conjunction with the property. 方法會從鍵盤讀取，即使標準輸入會被重新導向到的檔案方法。The method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the method. ## Examples 其中一個最常見的用法方法是停止程式執行，直到使用者按下按鍵，並在應用程式會終止或顯示其他視窗的資訊。One of the most common uses of the method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information. 下列範例會使用方法以等候使用者按下 Enter 鍵之前終止應用程式。The following example uses the method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app. 請注意，是否使用者按下任何其他金鑰，它不會回應至主控台。Note that, if the user presses any other key, it is not echoed to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadKey#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/cs/ReadKey2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadKey#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/vb/ReadKey2.vb#2)] 下列範例會使用方法，以顯示按下的使用者，且不回應該主控台該索引鍵的索引鍵的相關資訊。The following example uses the method to display information about the key pressed by a user without echoing that key to the console. [!code-cpp[console.readkey2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey2/CPP/rkbool.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.readkey2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey2/CS/rkbool.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.readkey2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey2/VB/rkbool.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從標準輸入資料流讀取下一行字元。

span.span: Reads the next line of characters from the standard input stream.

returns.span: 輸入資料流的下一行字元，或 (如果沒有其他可用字行)。

span.span: The next line of characters from the input stream, or if no more lines are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法從標準輸入資料流讀取一行。The method reads a line from the standard input stream. （行的定義，請參閱下列清單後面的段落）。這表示：(For the definition of a line, see the paragraph after the following list.) This means that: - 如果標準的輸入的裝置是鍵盤方法會封鎖，直到使用者按下**Enter**索引鍵。If the standard input device is the keyboard, the method blocks until the user presses the **Enter** key. 其中一個最常見的用法方法會暫停程式執行之前清除主控台，並顯示新的資訊，或提示使用者按 Enter 鍵終止應用程式之前。One of the most common uses of the method is to pause program execution before clearing the console and displaying new information to it, or to prompt the user to press the Enter key before terminating the application. 下列範例將說明這點。The following example illustrates this. [!code-cpp[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cpp/ReadLineSimple.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLineSimple.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLineSimple.vb#6)] - 如果標準輸入會被重新導向至檔案，方法從檔案讀取一行文字。If standard input is redirected to a file, the method reads a line of text from a file. 例如，以下是名為 ReadLine1.txt 文字檔：For example, the following is a text file named ReadLine1.txt: ``` This is the first line. This is the second line. This is the third line. This is the fourth line. ``` 下列範例會使用方法來讀取檔案從重新導向的輸入。The following example uses the method to read input that is redirected from a file. 方法傳回時，讀取的作業會終止`null`，這表示不能有行保持讀取。The read operation terminates when the method returns `null`, which indicates that no lines remain to be read. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLine3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLine3.vb#3)] 編譯範例，以可執行檔的具名 ReadLine1.exe 之後, 您可以執行從命令列語法After compiling the example to an executable named ReadLine1.exe, you can run it from the command line with the syntax ``` ReadLine1 < ReadLine1.txt ``` 可以讀取檔案的內容，並且顯示到主控台。to read the contents of the file and display them to the console. 一條線定義為一串字元後面接著歸位字元 (十六進位 0x000d)、 換行字元 (十六進位的 0x000a) 或值屬性。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return (hexadecimal 0x000d), a line feed (hexadecimal 0x000a), or the value of the property. 傳回的字串不包含終止的字元。The returned string does not contain the terminating character(s). 根據預設，此方法會讀取從 256 個字元的輸入緩衝區的輸入。By default, the method reads input from a 256-character input buffer. 因為這樣會包含的字元，方法可以讀取的行，其中包含多達 254 個字元。Because this includes the character(s), the method can read lines that contain up to 254 characters. 若要閱讀更長的線條，呼叫方法。To read longer lines, call the method. 方法以同步方式執行。The method executes synchronously. 也就是說，它會封鎖直到讀取一行，或按下 Ctrl + Z 鍵盤組合。That is, it blocks until a line is read or the Ctrl+Z keyboard combination is pressed. 屬性會傳回物件，代表標準輸入資料流，且具有兩個同步方法和非同步方法。The property returns a object that represents the standard input stream and that has both a synchronous method and an asynchronous method. 不過，當做為主控台的標準的輸入資料流以同步方式，而非以非同步方式執行，並傳回`Task`只完成讀取的作業之後。However, when used as the console's standard input stream, the executes synchronously rather than asynchronously and returns a `Task` only after the read operation has completed. 如果此方法會擲回例外狀況，在基礎的讀取器的位置物件進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已讀取到內部的字元數緩衝區是捨棄。If this method throws an exception, the reader's position in the underlying object is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 因為無法變更資料流中讀取器的位置，已讀取的字元是無法復原，並可重新初始化來只存取。Since the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 如果資料流中的初始位置為未知或資料流不支援搜尋，基礎也需要重新初始化。If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying also needs to be reinitialized. 若要避免這種情況，並產生強固的程式碼，您應該使用屬性和讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。To avoid such a situation and to produce robust code, you should use the property and method and store the read characters in a pre-allocated buffer. 如果此方法時會從主控台讀取輸入，按下 Ctrl + Z 字元，則方法會傳回`null`。If the Ctrl+Z character is pressed when the method is reading input from the console, the method returns `null`. 這可讓使用者，以防止進一步鍵盤輸入時在迴圈中呼叫方法。This enables the user to prevent further keyboard input when the method is called in a loop. 下列範例說明此案例。The following example illustrates this scenario. [!code-cpp[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cpp/readline2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLine2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLine2.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列範例需要兩個命令列引數： 現有的文字檔案的名稱和要寫入至輸出檔案名稱。The following example requires two command line arguments: the name of an existing text file, and the name of a file to write the output to. 它會開啟現有的文字檔，並將重新導向標準鍵盤輸入至該檔案。It opens the existing text file and redirects the standard input from the keyboard to that file. 它也會從主控台輸出檔的標準輸出重新導向。It also redirects the standard output from the console to the output file. 然後它會使用方法，以讀取每一行，在檔案中，以 tab 字元，取代每個序列的四個空格，並使用方法，將結果寫入輸出檔。It then uses the method to read each line in the file, replaces every sequence of four spaces with a tab character, and uses the method to write the result to the output file. [!code-cpp[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/CPP/inserttabs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/CS/inserttabs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/VB/inserttabs.vb#1)]

span.span: Sets the foreground and background console colors to their defaults.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前景和背景色彩會還原至存在於目前的處理序開始時的色彩。The foreground and background colors are restored to the colors that existed when the current process began. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會將儲存的值列舉型別陣列，並將目前的值和變數的屬性。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然後變更的前景色彩中的每個色彩列舉型別，但色彩符合目前的背景，而且它變成背景色彩中每個色彩以外的列舉型別，來比對的色彩目前的前景。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果前景色彩與背景色彩相同，文字看不到。）最後，它會呼叫方法來還原原始的主控台色彩。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來指定開始下一步 的寫入作業，在主控台視窗中的位置。Use the method to specify where the next write operation in the console window is to begin. 如果指定的資料指標位置超出目前會顯示在主控台視窗中的區域中，視窗原點將自動變更，以顯示資料指標。If the specified cursor position is outside the area that is currently visible in the console window, the window origin changes automatically to make the cursor visible. 資料指標會自動移至下一個字元位置每次將一個字元寫入至主控台視窗。The cursor automatically moves to the next character position each time a character is written to the console window. 如果游標位於主控台視窗底部右邊的字元位置下, 一個寫入作業會讓捲動，讓資料指標仍然會顯示 [主控台] 視窗。If the cursor is at the bottom right character position of the console window, the next write operation causes the console window to scroll so the cursor remains visible. 如果您想要將字元寫入而不會造成捲動，請使用 [主控台] 視窗底部右邊的字元位置方法，以將字元移至該位置。If you want to write a character to the bottom right character position without causing the console window to scroll, use the method to move a character to that position. ## Examples 此範例示範並屬性，而和方法。This example demonstrates the and properties, and the and methods. 範例會將定位資料指標，用來決定下, 一次寫入，就會發生 5 個字元的矩形混用繪製的 5 個字元"+"、"|"，和 「-」 字串。The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings. 請注意，無法使用較少的步驟使用的其他字串組合繪製矩形。Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks [作業系統] 視窗會顯示 [主控台] 視窗中，而主控台視窗顯示螢幕緩衝區的一部分。The operating system window displays the console window, and the console window displays a portion of the screen buffer. 方法影響相對於螢幕緩衝區的主控台視窗的位置，但不會影響相對於桌面的 [作業系統] 視窗的位置。The method affects the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer, but does not affect the position of the operating system window relative to the desktop. 主控台和作業系統 windows 通常不會影響彼此。The console and operating system windows generally do not affect each other. 不過，如果螢幕緩衝區無法顯示在主控台視窗的目前的界限，作業系統會自動附加捲軸至 [作業系統] 視窗。However, if the screen buffer cannot be displayed in the current boundaries of the console window, the operating system automatically appends scroll bars to the operating system window. 在此情況下，移動作業系統視窗捲軸會影響的主控台視窗中，位置和移動的主控台視窗方法會影響作業系統視窗捲軸的位置。In that case, moving the operating system window scroll bars affects the position of the console window, and moving the console window with the method affects the position of the operating system window scroll bars. ## Examples 下列範例示範， ， ， ， ， ，並屬性，而， ，和方法。The following example demonstrates the , , , , , , and properties; and the , , and methods. 範例會繪製格線模式，螢幕緩衝區的寬度為基礎的螢幕緩衝區中。The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width. 然後範例會移動以回應的向上箭號，向下鍵、 向左鍵或向右箭號的主控台按鍵已按下主控台視窗。Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed. 格線模式可協助您瞭解相對於螢幕緩衝區的主控台視窗的移動。The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出要將 輔助按鍵和 主控台按鍵 (Ctrl+C) 的組合視為一般輸入來處理，還是視為由作業系統處理的中斷。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combination of the modifier key and console key (Ctrl+C) is treated as ordinary input or as an interruption that is handled by the operating system.

value.span: 如果 Ctrl+C 要當做一般輸入來處理，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if Ctrl+C is treated as ordinary input; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值屬性是`false`並按下 Ctrl + C、 已按下的按鍵不會儲存在輸入緩衝區和作業系統會終止目前正在執行的處理序。If the value of the property is `false` and Ctrl+C is pressed, the pressed keys are not stored in the input buffer and the operating system terminates the currently executing process. 這是預設值。This is the default value. > [!CAUTION] > 請謹慎使用這個屬性，因為將它設定為`true`具有這類很大的影響。Use this property judiciously because setting it to `true` has such a dramatic effect. 大部分的使用者期望 Ctrl + C 來終止的主控台應用程式。Most users expect Ctrl+C to terminate a console application. 如果您停用 Ctrl + C 的效果，使用者必須請記得使用 Ctrl + Break 結束應用程式，也就是較不熟悉的按鍵組合。If you disable the effect of Ctrl+C, the user must remember to use Ctrl+Break to terminate the application, which is a less familiar key combination. ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試設定的值屬性時的輸出重新導向會擲回其中一個或例外狀況。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws either an or an exception. 若要避免例外狀況中,，您可以設定這個屬性只有當值屬性會傳回`false`。To prevent an exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 此範例示範方法，而和屬性。This example demonstrates the method, and the and properties. 您必須執行的範例，以查看完整的效果，變更主控台視窗大小。You must run the example to see the full effect of changing the console window size. 此範例會報告設定為 85 個欄和 43 個資料列中，主控台視窗的維度，然後等候按鍵動作。The example reports the dimensions of a console window set to 85 columns and 43 rows, then waits for a key press. 按下任意鍵時，維度的 [主控台] 視窗會變成一半、 回報新的維度，並等候另一個按鍵動作的範例。When any key is pressed, the dimensions of the console window are halved, the new dimensions are reported, and the example waits for another key press. 最後，當按下任何鍵主控台視窗會還原到其原始的維度，然後此範例會結束。Finally, when any key is pressed the console window is restored to its original dimensions and the example terminates. span.span: The leftmost console window position measured in columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主控台會代表矩形的視窗成較大的矩形緩衝區。The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area. 視窗和緩衝區測量是垂直的資料列和水平他們的資料行的數目。Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns. 所定義的緩衝區的維度和屬性。The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the and properties. 所定義的主控台區域維度和屬性。The dimensions of the console area are defined by the and properties. 屬性會決定哪一個資料行緩衝區的會顯示在主控台視窗中的第一個資料行。The property determines which column of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window. 值屬性的範圍可以從 0 到 - 。The value of the property can range from 0 to - . 嘗試設定的值，超出範圍則會擲回。Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an . 主控台視窗第一次開啟時，預設值屬性為零，表示顯示在主控台的第一個資料行對應至緩衝區中的第一個資料行 （位置為零的資料行）。When a console window first opens, the default value of the property is zero, which indicates that the first column shown by the console corresponds to the first column (the column at position zero) in the buffer area. 主控台視窗和緩衝區的預設寬度是 80 的資料行。The default width of both the console window and the buffer area is 80 columns. 這表示主控台視窗變窄或緩衝區進行更多情況下，才可以修改的屬性。This means that the property can be modified only if the console window is made narrower or the buffer area is made wider. 請注意，如果緩衝區的寬度超過的主控台視窗中，值的寬度屬性會自動調整時，使用者會使用水平捲軸緩衝區定義視窗的關聯性。Note that if the width of the buffer area exceeds the width of the console window, the value of the property is automatically adjusted when the user uses the horizontal scroll bar to define the window's relationship to the buffer area. 嘗試設定的值屬性時輸出重新導向會擲回例外狀況。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws an exception. 若要避免這個例外狀況，您可以設定的這個屬性只有當值屬性會傳回`false`。To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會開啟 80 資料行的主控台視窗，並定義是 120 寬的資料行緩衝區。The following example opens an 80-column console window and defines a buffer area that is 120 columns wide. 它會顯示資訊 視窗和緩衝區大小，然後等候使用者按下向左鍵或向右鍵。It displays information on window and buffer size, and then waits for the user to press either the LEFT ARROW key or the RIGHT ARROW key. 在前一個案例中，它遞減值屬性其中一個結果是否合法的值。In the former case, it decrements the value of the property by one if the result is a legal value. 在後者的情況下，它會增加值一如果結果會是合法的屬性。In the latter case, it increases the value of the property by one if the result would be legal. 請注意，此範例不需要處理，因為它會檢查的值指派給屬性不是負數，並不會導致總和並超過屬性屬性值。Note that the example does not have to handle an , because it checks that the value to be assigned to the property is not negative and does not cause the sum of the and properties to exceed the property value. [!code-cpp[System.Console.WindowLeft#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.windowleft/cpp/windowleft1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.WindowLeft#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.windowleft/cs/windowleft1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WindowLeft#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.windowleft/vb/windowleft1.vb#1)]

span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified object to the standard output stream using the specified format information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用[複合格式功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)物件的值轉換成其文字表示，並將該表示內嵌在字串中的.NET framework。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 產生的字串寫入至輸出資料流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format`參數是由零個或多個文字執行混合零或多個索引的預留位置，稱為格式項目，對應至這個方法的參數清單中的物件。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式化的程序會將每個格式項目取代對應的物件值的文字表示。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式項目的語法`{` *index*[`,`*對齊*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，指定必要的索引、 選用的長度和格式化的文字的對齊方式和控管如何格式化的對應物件值的格式規範字元的選擇性字串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 如需有關這類方法支援複合格式功能， ，和一些多載，請參閱[複合格式化](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關日期和時間格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 如需列舉格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用 `WriteLine` 方法，示範數字、日期和列舉型別的標準格式化規範。The following example uses the `WriteLine` method to demonstrate the standard formatting specifiers for numbers, dates, and enumerations. [!code-cpp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cpp/wl.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cs/wl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/vb/wl.vb#1)] 在下列程式碼中，說明了如何使用 方法。The following example illustrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Console-REFORMAT#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-REFORMAT/CPP/reformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console-REFORMAT#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-REFORMAT/CS/reformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console-REFORMAT#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-REFORMAT/VB/reformat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用[複合格式功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)物件的值轉換成其文字表示，並將該表示內嵌在字串中的.NET framework。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 產生的字串寫入至輸出資料流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format`參數是由零個或多個文字執行混合零或多個索引的預留位置，稱為格式項目，對應至這個方法的參數清單中的物件。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式化的程序會將每個格式項目取代對應的物件值的文字表示。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式項目的語法`{` *index*[`,`*對齊*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，指定必要的索引、 選用的長度和格式化的文字的對齊方式和控管如何格式化的對應物件值的格式規範字元的選擇性字串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 如需有關這類方法支援複合格式功能， ，和一些多載，請參閱[複合格式化](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關日期和時間格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 如需列舉格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `arg`參數是參數陣列。The `arg` parameter is a parameter array. 引數可以傳遞給方法，為陣列或五個或多個項目清單。Arguments can be passed to the method either as an array or as list of five or more items. 範例將說明兩種形式的方法呼叫。The examples illustrate both forms of method call. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Person`類別提供個人資訊的屬性數目。The following example defines a `Person` class with a number of properties that provide information about a person. 其`GetDescription`方法會傳回陣列，其中包含所有屬性值，但有一個例外。Its `GetDescription` method returns an array that contains all of the property values except one. 然後此範例會使用所傳回的陣列`GetDescription`方法來顯示 Person 物件的值。The example then uses the array returned by the `GetDescription` method to display the values of the Person object. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Write#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cs/WriteParams1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Write#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/vb/WriteParams1.vb#1)] 請注意，此範例會呼叫方法而非方法因為它會嘗試將值顯示`Person.Remarks`同一行上的屬性。Note that the example calls the method rather than the method because it attempts to display the value of the `Person.Remarks` property on the same line. 若要這樣做，它會檢查的值和屬性，以判斷是否有足夠的空間來容納備註。To do this, it examines the value of the and properties to determine whether there is enough space for the remark to fit. 如果沒有，它會顯示線條。If there is, it displays the line. 如果沒有，它將某行寫入，則縮排在三個空格，並顯示備註。If not, it writes a line, indents three spaces, and displays the remark. 下列範例等同於第一天，不同之處在於它會提供五個項目清單做為`arg`引數，而不是參數陣列。The following example is identical to the first, except that it supplies a five-item list as the `arg` argument instead of a parameter array. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Write#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cs/WriteParams2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Write#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/vb/WriteParams2.vb#2)]

span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified object, followed by the current line terminator, to the standard output stream using the specified format information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用[複合格式功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)物件的值轉換成其文字表示，並將該表示內嵌在字串中的.NET framework。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 產生的字串寫入至輸出資料流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format`參數是由零個或多個文字執行混合零或多個索引的預留位置，稱為格式項目，對應至這個方法的參數清單中的物件。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式化的程序會將每個格式項目取代對應的物件值的文字表示。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式項目的語法`{` *index*[`,`*對齊*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，指定必要的索引、 選用的長度和格式化的文字的對齊方式和控管如何格式化的對應物件值的格式規範字元的選擇性字串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 如需有關這類方法支援複合格式功能， ，和一些多載，請參閱[複合格式化](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關日期和時間格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 如需列舉格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如需行結束字元的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節不接受任何參數的方法。For more information about the line terminator, see the Remarks section of the method that takes no parameters. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，以顯示五個隨機產生值。The following example calls the method to display five randomly generated values. [!code-csharp[System.Console.WriteLine#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/CS/WriteLine6.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WriteLine#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/VB/WriteLine6.vb#6)] 下列範例會呼叫方法，以顯示目前的日期。The following example calls the method to display the current date. 請注意，格式項目`format`引數會使用"D"[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)中目前的文化特性的長日期格式顯示日期。Note that the format item in the `format` argument uses the "D" [standard date and time format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) to display the date in the long date format of the current culture. [!code-csharp[System.Console.WriteLine#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/CS/WriteLine7.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WriteLine#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/VB/WriteLine7.vb#7)]

如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關日期和時間格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 如需列舉格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如需行結束字元的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節不接受任何參數的方法。For more information about the line terminator, see the Remarks section of the method that takes no parameters. ## Examples 下列範例會示範數字、日期和列舉型別的標準格式化規範。The following example demonstrates the standard formatting specifiers for numbers, dates, and enumerations. [!code-cpp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cpp/wl.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cs/wl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/vb/wl.vb#1)] 下列範例是提示計算機來計算 18%提示，並使用方法來顯示原始的電量、 提示、 數量和總金額。The following example is a tip calculator that calculates an 18% tip and uses the method to display the amount of the original charge, the amount of the tip, and the total amount. 此範例是費用的主控台應用程式需要使用者提供的原始，做為命令列參數的數量。The example is a console application that requires the user to supply the amount of the original charge as a command-line parameter. [!code-csharp[System.Console.WriteLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/CS/tipcalc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WriteLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/VB/tipcalc.vb#1)]

span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified objects and variable-length parameter list, followed by the current line terminator, to the standard output stream using the specified format information.
